notes: Bureau Veritas is a global leader in testing, inspection, and certification services. They provide comprehensive compliance and auditing services for cosmetics manufacturers including regulatory audits, quality system certification, and supply chain auditing. Bureau Veritas also offers environmental compliance audits to support sustainability initiatives.
